fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- A Minecraft Head role will always spawn
- Factional chat
- No factional kill
- If the Head member dies, at the start of the next night, a random role becomes their role. They gain the Head member's resources, if any, but not their items.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear (what??)

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Slay all else and turn them into gear (what??)
